content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

content: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

content: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

content: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

content: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

content: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

content: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

content: Keep your face always toward the sunshineâ€”and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

content: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

content: Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
author: Alice Morse Earle

content: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
author: Jim Rohn

content: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

content: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

content: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

content: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

content: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
author: Albert Schweitzer

content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

content: Life is a journey, not a destination.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

content: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
author: T.S. Eliot

content: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
author: Bob Marley
